derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (denoting a dog that yaps): imitative

entry.def: If a small dog yaps, it makes short loud sounds in an excited way.

example.tran: 两只疯狂吠叫的凯恩犭更狗

entry.tran: 哇啦哇啦地说个不停;瞎扯
entry.def: If you say that someone yaps, you mean that they talk continuously in an annoying way.

example.ex: The guy just loves to yap, and will do so at length...
example.tran: 那家伙就爱胡扯，而且一说起来就没完没了。

example.ex: She keeps yapping at me about Joe.
example.tran: 她没完没了地和我唠叨着乔的事。
